entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
